Html: I'm having troubles with PHPWord when it comes to Hebrew. Everything works just fine but when I try to use Hebrew strings it shows up as gibberish.. tried to solve it, with no success though.. Can anyone give me a solution? thanks in advance!!!!!

hello

add :

header('Content-type: text/html; charset=UTF-8');

and remove all the utf-8 info in the php files ... it work fine for me in arabic.
